Specimen Type(s): Bacterial isolate (aerobic Gram-negative and Gram-positive, and fastidious bacteria)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Etest Ceftazidime/Avibactam (CZA) strip for quantitative agar-based MIC antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative technique to determine antimicrobial susceptibility (MIC) of both non-fastidious Gram-negative and Gram-positive aerobic and fastidious bacteria to Ceftazidime/Avibactam, used on agar media with overnight incubation.
